about_the_game:
Getting shooters back on the right track—just as gamers want.

Entropia is an original tactical first-person shooter featuring brutal battles in a fully destructible environment. Victory comes to the one who adapts, organizes and is unafraid to experiment.

Powerful weapons and dozens of gadgets for attack, defense or reconnaissance: create unique combinations yourself or with your teammates, turn your tactical creativity to the max!

Variety of classic and modern weapons with detailed mechanisms and distinctive features, brutal character voiceover, customization, destructibility and dismemberment.

Unique class system

Variety, fairness, and charisma. Five class-based characters, each with three distinct specializations. Each class is a unique character with their own backstory and motivations. Complete with original voices and dynamic relationships!

Original visual style

A down-to-earth war atmosphere: original stylistics and a grim color palette immerse you in an alternate Modern History setting. Beneath the low-poly aesthetic lies meticulous attention to detail: authentic, carefully recreated weapons and gear, vehicles, and camouflage. And no pink skins here—just gritty, worn-out uniforms!

Freedom

Entropia is a story about people in a complex world, unafraid to portray vastly different realities. You can expect an original brutal narrative, bold characters, and an equally daring approach to your freedom of choice: it’s up to you to decide what’s constructive and what’s destructive.

Stay tuned!

The game and the universe are in the process of development. New mechanics, new weapons, new characters and locations all over the world, new story discoveries are waiting ahead!

Regular development updates are posted on Discord and other social media — join the discussions and stay connected!

Add Entropia to Wishlist!

Entropia. Made by gamers with love.

content_descriptors.notes: Entropia contains display of weapons, frequent violence and strong language as a part of multiplayer first-person shooter featuring semi-realistic warfare.
